items.title: Ukrainians back Zelensky after disastrous White House encounter
items.description: The more the country is attacked, the more unity there is, Ukrainians tell the BBC in Kyiv.

items.title: Pope has 'peaceful night' after breathing crisis, Vatican says
items.description: The Pope has been battling pneumonia for two weeks and suffered an "isolated" breathing crisis on Friday.

items.title: European leaders back Zelensky after Trump clash
items.description: The Ukrainian president thanks European leaders for their support after a flurry of messages on social media.

items.title: Steve Rosenberg: Vladimir Putin can afford to sit back and watch events unfold
items.description: A breakdown in relations between Ukraine and the US is potentially very serious for Kyiv, but very positive for Moscow.

items.title: Kurdish group PKK declares ceasefire with Turkey
items.description: The PKK calls for the release of its jailed leader Abdullah Ocalan to lead a process of disarmament.
